name: Head Souphead SLR II Pro Junior Skis - Children to Youths
categories: Souphead SLR II Pro Junior Skis
description: Park and pipe skis for junior shredders. The Souphead SLR II’s twintip design lets up-and-coming rippers show up their parents. A structured top and durable base mean they stand up to rail bails and even drops down lodge stairs. Included SLR bindings are light and reliable.Structured surface with E Base Black offers durability and flex tuned for young tricksters.Most versatile ski in Head's junior ski lineup performs in variable snow conditions.Twintip construction makes for a fun ride.SLR 4.5 AC binding on lengths 87, 97, 107 and 117cm.SLR 7.5 AC binding on lengths 127 and 137cm.
